publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6199 Richard Baker: Journalist Team Award for Aberdeen Evening Express—That the Parliament congratulates all the winners at the Scottish Press Awards 2010, in particular the Aberdeen Evening Express on winning the Journalist Team award for its coverage of the North Sea helicopter tragedy on 1 April 2009; recognises the newspaper’s sensitive delivery of coverage of the event in which 16 people were tragically killed, and considers that regional and local newspapers play an important role in the north east and throughout Scotland. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*, James Kelly*

S3M-6199 Journalist Team Award for Aberdeen Evening Express (lodged on 23 April 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Nanette Milne*, Brian Adam*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Marlyn Glen*, Duncan McNeil*, Paul Martin*, Rhona Brankin*
